wikipedia_page.main: Madog Benfras (i.e. Madog "Greathead") (fl. 1340) was a Welsh poet. He is otherwise known from involvement in legal cases at Wrexham in 1340.

link_mentions.page: List of Welsh-language poets (6th century to c. 1600)
response: *Madog Benfras (fl. c. 1320–1360) – best known for his elegy on Dafydd ap Gwilym.
